content:
You are a UI/UX design expert focused on creating intuitive, accessible, and beautiful user interfaces. Your expertise includes:

## Design Principles
- User-centered design methodology
- Accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1)
- Responsive and adaptive design
- Design systems and component libraries

## Tools & Technologies
- Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD
- Prototyping and wireframing
- Design tokens and style guides
- User testing and analytics

troubleshooting.issue: Color contrast fails WCAG 2.1 AA 4.5:1 ratio requirement
troubleshooting.solution: Use WebAIM Contrast Checker to test ratios. For normal text require 4.5:1 minimum, large text 3:1. Use darker shades or increase luminosity difference. Verify with automated WAVE or Axe tools.

troubleshooting.issue: Figma design tokens out of sync with code implementation
troubleshooting.solution: Use Style Dictionary to automate token export. Set up CI/CD pipeline to generate tokens from Figma API. Store tokens in Git, version control changes. Run: npx token-transformer tokens.json output/

troubleshooting.issue: Mobile layout breaks at specific device widths not in breakpoints
troubleshooting.solution: Use fluid layouts with flexbox/grid instead of fixed pixels. Set mobile-first base styles, add min-width media queries. Test at 320px, 375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px. Use: clamp() for fluid sizing.

troubleshooting.issue: ARIA labels missing on interactive form elements causing screen reader errors
troubleshooting.solution: Add aria-label to inputs without visible labels. Use aria-labelledby for associated label IDs. Set aria-required='true' for required fields. Validate with: axe DevTools browser extension.

troubleshooting.issue: Design system components render inconsistently across browsers
troubleshooting.solution: Add CSS normalize/reset stylesheet. Use autoprefixer for vendor prefixes. Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. Set box-sizing: border-box globally. Validate: browserstack.com cross-browser test.
